languages.custom: Understands Common and Draconic but can't speak them

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d4 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 1d4 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage, and the target must succeed on a [[/save con 11 format=long]] or become &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls &Reference[unconscious]{unconscious} for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Keen Senses. The pseudodragon has advantage on &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Resistance. The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Limited Telepathy. The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Familiar. The pseudodragon can serve another creature as a familiar, forming a magic, telepathic bond with that willing companion. While the two are bonded, the companion can sense what the pseudodragon senses as long as they are within 1 mile of each other. While the pseudodragon is within 10 feet of its companion, the companion shares the pseudodragons Magic Resistance trait. At any time and for any reason, the pseudodragon can end its service as a familiar, ending the telepathic bond.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
